basics.name: Donald Lipps
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2026.

awards.title: Dean's List
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to students with a cumulative high school GPA of 3.8+, renewed based on continued success in university classes.

awards.title: Manoa Academic Merit Scholarship
awards.summary: Awarded to students who earn a semester GPA of 3.5 or higher based on 12 credits or more and do not receive any no credit, withdrawn, incomplete, or failure course grades.

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.
